text: three weeks on from her release Chloe
returned to the UK this weekend to her
home here in Coulsdon in Surrey I've
been through a terrifying experience I
feared for my life second by second
minute by minute hour by hour I'm
incredibly grateful to the Italian and
the UK authorities for all they have
done to secure my safe release I have
just arrived home after four weeks of
being in Italy I haven't had the time to
gather my faults so I'm not at liberty
to say anything further until I have
been debriefed by the UK police just 20
and still starting out in her glamour
modeling career Chloe
ailing landed a dream photoshoot in
Italy but when she arrived at this
disused shop in Milan
she says she was grabbed by someone
whilst another person injected something
into her forearm
she says she woke bound and gagged in
the boot of a car
Eldora me crystal the perpetrator is a
dangerous person he describes himself as
a paid killer and part of an
organization that carries out mercenary
services bomb attacks and kidnappings
stuffed into a bag like this one later
demonstrated by Italian police Chloe
says she was taken a hundred and twenty
miles to this remote farmhouse near
Turin and held for the next six days
tied to a wooden chest of drawers it's
understood her captors demanded a
230,000 pounds ransom but were also
telling her she would be auctioned for
sexual services on the dark web a
secretive part of the Internet by a
criminal group known to Europol as the
Black Death but Chloe's captivity was
suddenly ended she was taken here to the
British Consulate in Milan after
revealing she had a child
this man Lucas Herbert a pole who lives
in the UK is accused of the kidnapping
and was arrested after freeing the young

whilst Chloe is now recovering here at
home it's understood investigations are
